summary: Provides classes and helpers to encode, decode, and manipulate SPNEGO (Simple and Protected GSS‑API Negotiation Mechanism) tokens, including GSS‑API data handling and ASN.1 structures, facilitating construction and parsing of authentication negotiation messages.
business_intent: Support secure authentication negotiation in network services by enabling the creation and interpretation of SPNEGO tokens used by protocols such as Kerberos and NTLM.
